title: What to know about Democrat giving rebuttal after Trump's address
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will address a Joint Session of Congress Tuesday. Democrats have chosen Michigan Sen. Elissa Slotkin to deliver the rebuttal.

title: State of the Union? Not quite. What to know about Trump's speech.
shortDescription: Trump is expected to talk about what he's done since taking office and more. But the event will not technically be a State of the Union address.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy have heated exchange | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Education Department offers employees $25K to quit or retire by Monday. | Some Americans are opting to raise chickens amid rising cost of eggs.

title: What time is Trump's address to Congress? How to watch, stream
shortDescription: Multiple media outlets, including USA TODAY and other major networks plan to stream or air live coverage of the address.

title: Trump speech to Congress likely to be 'imperial,' say analysts
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump will address a joint session of Congress for the first time in his new term.

title: Western leaders to present peace deal to Trump
shortDescription: Britain and France will work on a peace deal with Ukraine and present it to Donald Trump, British Prime Minister Keir Starmer said.

title: Trump will survey a landscape transformed in speech to Congress
shortDescription: Was it just a year ago that Joe Biden was delivering the State of the Union? This year's audience will display a different world.

title: UK, France and Ukraine will present peace deal to Donald Trump
shortDescription: Britain and France will work on a peace deal with Ukraine and present it to Donald Trump, British Prime Minister Keir Starmer said on Sunday.

title: Trump's firing of watchdog agency head is illegal, judge says
shortDescription: A judge declared President Donald Trump's firing of the head of a federal watchdog agency illegal in an early test of the scope of presidential power.

title: Donald Trump state visit: UK leader rejects calls to cancel offer
shortDescription: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday dismissed calls to cancel the offer of a state visit to President Donald Trump.

title: Dismantling agencies and firing workers: Trump redefines presidential power
shortDescription: Trump claims he has the executive power to dismantle agencies and fire thousands of workers. Will court fights redefine his relations with Congress?

title: Trump pushes U.S. timber production, forest management in new order
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order that looks to federal forest management following the devastating Los Angeles wildfires.

title: Trump takes back property seized by FBI, White House says
shortDescription: The FBI handed back boxes of materials that President Donald Trump had taken to his Mar-a-Lago Florida estate upon leaving the White House in 2021.

title: Rubio says Zelenskyy should apologize after argument with Trump and Vance
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio says Ukrainian president should apologize for 'wasting our time' after Oval Office argument

title: Watch the video: Trump and Zelenskyy argue over war with Russia
shortDescription: President Trump and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy's heated argument in the Oval Office resulted in the Ukrainian leader being asked to leave
